title.narrative: COLD CHAIN AND VACCINE SUPPLIES SYSTEMS

description.narrative: Health facilities in deprived provinces and other focus areas have cold chain, vaccine and adequate infrastructure to provide routine immunization services, which contributes to Health And Development In Early Childhood And Adolescence, Immunization, Immunization Services As Part Of Primary Health Care, Mental Health And Psychosocial Well-Being, Nutrition Of Adolescents And Women. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Developing And Leveraging Resources And Partnerships, Fostering Innovation And Use Of New Technologies, Innovation, Operational Support To Programme Delivery, Partnerships And Engagement: Public And Private, Systems Strengthening And Institution Building, Systems Strengthening To Leave No One Behind. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: Improved access and increased utilization of quality and equity focused Maternal, Neonatal, and Child Health (MNCH) and immunization services for mothers, new born, U5 children and adolescent girls in most deprived provinces and areas
